tool_input.content:
# FlockNerd Mobile App — Implementation Spec

## Status Legend
- [ ] Not started
- [~] In progress
- [x] Complete

---

## Phase 0: Monorepo Conversion
**Goal**: Restructure into Turborepo + bun workspaces without breaking the existing web app.

### Target Structure
```
chicken-tracker-t3/
  turbo.json
  package.json              ← workspace root
  apps/
    web/                    ← existing Next.js app (MOVED from root)
    mobile/                 ← NEW Expo app
  packages/
    api/                    ← shared tRPC AppRouter type + client helpers
    shared/                 ← types, Zod schemas, date-utils, constants
```

### Tasks
- [ ] 0.1 Create root `package.json` (workspace root with `"workspaces"`)
- [ ] 0.2 Create `turbo.json`
- [ ] 0.3 Create `apps/` and `packages/` directories
- [ ] 0.4 Move existing app into `apps/web/` (src, public, prisma, configs, .env)
- [ ] 0.5 Update `apps/web/package.json` — fix name, paths, scripts
- [ ] 0.6 Update `apps/web/tsconfig.json` — fix paths/baseUrl
- [ ] 0.7 Update `apps/web/next.config.mjs` — add transpilePackages for workspace packages
- [ ] 0.8 Update `apps/web/drizzle.config.ts` — fix schema path
- [ ] 0.9 Update `apps/web/tailwind.config.cjs` — fix content paths
- [ ] 0.10 Update all internal imports that use relative paths crossing boundaries
- [ ] 0.11 Update `.gitignore` for monorepo
- [ ] 0.12 Run `bun install` at root
- [ ] 0.13 Verify `bun run build` for web app works
- [ ] 0.14 Verify `bun run dev` for web app works

---

## Phase 1: Shared Packages
**Goal**: Extract shared types, schemas, and utilities for cross-platform use.

### packages/api
- [ ] 1.1 Create `packages/api/package.json`
- [ ] 1.2 Create `packages/api/tsconfig.json`
- [ ] 1.3 Create `packages/api/index.ts` — re-export `AppRouter`, `RouterInputs`, `RouterOutputs`
- [ ] 1.4 Export `createTRPCReact<AppRouter>()` helper

### packages/shared
- [ ] 1.5 Create `packages/shared/package.json`
- [ ] 1.6 Create `packages/shared/tsconfig.json`
- [ ] 1.7 Create `packages/shared/src/types.ts` — User, Flock, Breed, EggLog, Expense, Task, Notification
- [ ] 1.8 Create `packages/shared/src/constants.ts` — design tokens, expense categories
- [ ] 1.9 Create `packages/shared/src/date-utils.ts` — formatDate, timezone helpers
- [ ] 1.10 Create `packages/shared/src/index.ts` — barrel export

---

## Phase 2: Expo App Scaffold
**Goal**: Initialize Expo app with auth, tRPC, and navigation structure.

### 2.1 Initialize
- [ ] 2.1 Create Expo app: `bunx create-expo-app@latest apps/mobile --template tabs`
- [ ] 2.2 Install core dependencies (Clerk, tRPC, react-query, NativeWind, etc.)

### 2.2 Auth + Providers
- [ ] 2.3 Set up Clerk provider in `_layout.tsx` with `expo-secure-store` token cache
- [ ] 2.4 Set up tRPC provider with Clerk Bearer token in headers
- [ ] 2.5 Set up React Query provider

### 2.3 Navigation
- [ ] 2.6 Create navigation structure with Expo Router:
  - `(auth)/sign-in.tsx`, `(auth)/sign-up.tsx`
  - `(app)/(tabs)/_layout.tsx` — Bottom tabs: Home | Logs | Expenses | Settings
  - `(app)/(tabs)/index.tsx` — Flocks list
  - `(app)/(tabs)/logs.tsx`
  - `(app)/(tabs)/expenses.tsx`
  - `(app)/(tabs)/settings.tsx`
  - `(app)/flocks/[flockId]/index.tsx`
  - `(app)/flocks/[flockId]/edit.tsx`

---

## Phase 3: Core Screens
**Goal**: Build main CRUD screens with real tRPC data.

- [ ] 3.1 Flocks List — `FlatList` with flock cards, "Add Flock" FAB
- [ ] 3.2 Flock Detail/Dashboard — stats cards, production chart, expense chart, breeds, tasks
- [ ] 3.3 Charts — `victory-native` production & expense charts with range selectors
- [ ] 3.4 Log Eggs Modal — bottom sheet with date picker, count, breed selector, notes
- [ ] 3.5 Log Expense Modal — bottom sheet with date, amount, category, memo
- [ ] 3.6 Breed Add/Edit — form with image picker + Firebase upload
- [ ] 3.7 All Logs & All Expenses — paginated FlatList with filters

---

## Phase 4: Secondary Screens
- [ ] 4.1 Flock Edit — form + image upload + delete confirmation
- [ ] 4.2 Flock Summary — monthly stats with share capability
- [ ] 4.3 Tasks — today/upcoming toggle, mark complete, recurring
- [ ] 4.4 Notifications — list with mark-as-read, unread badge
- [ ] 4.5 Settings — profile via Clerk `useUser()`
- [ ] 4.6 Breeding Planner — bird profiles, pair manager

---

## Phase 5: Server-Side Changes
**Goal**: Enable mobile app to communicate with existing tRPC backend.

- [ ] 5.1 Add CORS headers to `apps/web/src/app/api/trpc/[trpc]/route.ts`
- [ ] 5.2 Add OPTIONS preflight handler
- [ ] 5.3 Add `/api/trpc` to public routes in middleware (Clerk Bearer token auth)
- [ ] 5.4 Verify `getAuth(req)` works with Bearer tokens from Expo Clerk

---

## Phase 6: Build & Deploy
- [ ] 6.1 Create `eas.json` with dev/preview/production profiles
- [ ] 6.2 Configure env vars (EXPO_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY, EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL)
- [ ] 6.3 Test EAS build for iOS
- [ ] 6.4 Test EAS build for Android
- [ ] 6.5 Set up EAS Update for OTA

---

## Component Mapping (Web → Mobile)

| Web | Mobile |
|-----|--------|
| Radix Dialog / Vaul Drawer | `@gorhom/bottom-sheet` |
| Radix Select | `@react-native-picker/picker` |
| react-day-picker | `@react-native-community/datetimepicker` |
| chart.js | `victory-native` |
| next/image | `expo-image` |
| next/link | Expo Router `Link` |
| react-hot-toast | `burnt` |
| motion | `react-native-reanimated` |
| react-icons | `@expo/vector-icons` |
| Tailwind CSS | NativeWind v4 |

---

## Design Tokens
```
Primary:    #385968
Secondary:  #84A8A3
Tertiary:   #CD7660
Accent1:    #e76f51
Accent2:    #e9c46a
Background: #FEF9F6
```

---

## Files Moved to `apps/web/`
- `src/`, `public/`, `prisma/`, `.env`
- `next.config.mjs`, `tsconfig.json`, `tailwind.config.cjs`, `postcss.config.cjs`
- `drizzle.config.ts`, `.eslintrc.json`, `prettier.config.cjs`
- `components.json`, `next-env.d.ts`, `next-pwa.d.ts`
- `middleware.ts` (stays at src/middleware.ts inside apps/web/)

## Files Staying at Root
- `turbo.json`, root `package.json`, `.gitignore`, `.claude/`, `CLAUDE.md`
- `README.md`, `bun.lockb`
- `.git/`, `.vscode/`

tool_input.subject: Phase 1: Create shared packages (api + shared)
tool_input.description: Create packages/api (re-exports AppRouter, tRPC helpers) and packages/shared (types, constants, date-utils) for cross-platform use.

tool_input.subject: Phase 2: Expo app scaffold with auth + tRPC + navigation

tool_input.subject: Phase 5: Server-side CORS + auth changes for mobile
tool_input.description: Add CORS headers and OPTIONS handler to tRPC route. Update middleware to allow Bearer token auth from Expo Clerk.

tool_input.subject: Phase 3: Core screens (Flocks, Dashboard, Charts, Modals)
tool_input.description: Build main mobile screens: flocks list, flock detail/dashboard, charts, log eggs/expense modals, breed CRUD, paginated lists.

    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "incremental": true

}

tool_input.prompt:
Run `cd /Users/joshnewton/Development/chicken-tracker-t3/apps/web && bun run build` to check for ESLint and TypeScript errors. If errors found, fix them and re-run. Continue until build passes or 10 fix attempts fail. Report back with success or list of unresolved errors.

Important: Use `bun` not `npm`. The project is at /Users/joshnewton/Development/chicken-tracker-t3. Only the web app needs building (the mobile app is Expo and doesn't have a traditional build step in the monorepo).

tool_input.prompt:
You are in /Users/joshnewton/Development/chicken-tracker-t3 on branch `app-dir`.

1. Run `git status` to see all changes
2. Run `git diff --stat` to see changed files summary  
3. Run `git log --oneline -5` to see recent commit style
4. Stage all changes with `git add .`
5. Create a commit with this message format (NO co-author line, NO "Generated with Claude Code"):

```
feature: Add mobile app screens and components

Changes:
- Fix tRPC procedure name mismatches (getLogs, getExpenses, getFlock params)
- Add LogEggsModal with stepper UI and haptic feedback
- Add LogExpenseModal with currency input and category chips
- Add AddFlockModal for creating new flocks
- Add BreedFormModal for create/edit/delete breeds
- Add ProductionChart and ExpenseChart components
- Add swipe-to-delete on logs and expenses lists
- Update flock detail with charts, tasks, breed management
- Update notifications screen with real tRPC data
- Update settings with notification badge and navigation
- Install expo-haptics for native feedback
- Update MOBILE_APP_SPEC.md with progress
```

Use a HEREDOC to pass the commit message. Then push to origin with `git push origin app-dir`.

IMPORTANT: 
- Never include "Generated with Claude Code" or co-author text
- The branch name is `app-dir` (no ClickUp ID to extract)
- Use `git add .` to stage everything
